text: gamefan's faint praise on the cover is a great disservice to this game. It's one of the best RPGs on the playstation.
author: Gabriel Rocha

text: The hidden boss fight vs Zed (along with the hidden Boom.Flash) were easily the most difficult ones in the game. Esp given how simplistic he was up until then, you get completely blindsided by how overpowered he is when transformed.

no he isnt. you can either trickster the mobs before the boss for fire immune items or do the easy thing and buy a buttload of goats beforehand. Besides, he is only accessible when youve nearly completed the game anyway

text: Always found this character theme memorable. Zed was the game's comic relief, often imposing himself to battle against you. He was quite powerful though. He kind of reminds me of Gilgamesh in a way.
